reviews.Title: Super!
reviews.Comment:
This is my first flagship phone and I am glad to have one of my dream phones in my hand. If you are switching from android to ios then here are some pros and cons that I felt after 3 months of usage.

Pros:
1. Face ID is really fast and eases things off.
2. There is no lag or jitter even after heavy usage.
3. RAM management is almost next level, you can start an app where you left even after days.
4. You don't need to worry about photos and videos, they'll always look good.
5. Using and switc...
